TITLE: Co-Op Program
DEF: Integration of academic coursework with practical work experience in a relevant field
TASK: The Co-op Program pattern integrates academic coursework with practical work experience in a relevant field. To address issues like limited opportunities and disjointed experiences, COOPR underlines the necessity of strong partnerships with employers, structured learning objectives, and continuous communication. This pattern leverages AI to match learners with suitable opportunities and provide continuous learning support during the work experience.
